ruling: - The Battle Damage doubled by [[Stone Statue of the Aztecs]]' effect is still considered Battle Damage (not effect damage).
- If [[Rod of the Mind's Eye]] is equipped to [[Stone Statue of the Aztecs]], the Battle Damage will be 1000.
- The Battle Damage is doubled during damage calculation.
- When [[Amazoness Swords Woman]] (1500 ATK) attacks [[Stone Statue of the Aztecs]] (2000 DEF), the controller of Stone Statue of the Aztecs takes 1000 Battle Damage.
